document_data.name: Madame Rosene
document_data.mainbody: '''Madame Rosene''' was the owner of the [[Driftwood Tavern]], one of the most popular taverns of [[Neverwinter]], and the leader of the [[Sons of Alagondar#The Graycloaks|Graycloaks]] faction of the [[Sons of Alagondar]] in the late years of the 15{{Th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Madame Rosene was slow to trust in strangers, preferring to deal with the inhabitants of Neverwinter who had lived there since before the eruption of [[Mount Hotenow]].
document_data.Activities: Besides being the owner of the Driftwood Tavern, she was also the leader of the conservative faction of the Sons of Alagondar insurgent movement, the Graycloacks.
